arguments.name: Choking Miasma
arguments.description: A cloud that deals Chaos Damage over Time will follow you

arguments.name: Choking Miasma II
arguments.description: A large cloud that deals Chaos Damage over Time will follow you

arguments.name: Choking Miasma III
arguments.description: A large and fast cloud that deals Chaos Damage over Time will follow you

arguments.name: Choking Miasma IV
arguments.description: A large and very fast cloud that slows you and deals Chaos Damage over Time will follow you

arguments.name: Stormcaller Runes
arguments.description: Runes will appear that will call deadly Lightning storms if you remain in them

arguments.name: Stormcaller Runes II
arguments.description: Large runes will appear that will call deadly Lightning storms if you remain in them

arguments.name: Stormcaller Runes III
arguments.description: Many large runes will appear that will call deadly Lightning storms if you remain in them

arguments.name: Stormcaller Runes IV
arguments.description: Many large runes will appear that will call deadly Lightning storms if you remain in them for a short amount of time

arguments.name: Raging Dead
arguments.description: Skulls will appear that spit Fire if you remain near them

arguments.name: Raging Dead II
arguments.description: Many skulls will appear that spit Fire if you remain near them

arguments.name: Raging Dead III
arguments.description: Many skulls will appear that pursue you and spit Fire when near you

arguments.name: Raging Dead IV
arguments.description: Many skulls will appear that pursue you and quickly spit a large wave of Fire when near you

arguments.name: Blistering Cold
arguments.description: Frozen pustules will periodically appear and explode when you approach

arguments.name: Blistering Cold II
arguments.description: Many frozen pustules will periodically appear and rapidly explode when you approach

arguments.name: Blistering Cold III
arguments.description: Many frozen pustules will periodically appear, chill you, and rapidly explode when you approach

arguments.name: Blistering Cold IV
arguments.description: Many frozen pustules will periodically appear, chill you, and rapidly explode when you approach, freezing if they hit

arguments.name: Restless Ground
arguments.description: Patches of Unhallowed Ground will appear that Hinder players and cause slain Monsters to resurrect as Phantasms

arguments.name: Restless Ground II
arguments.description: Many patches of Unhallowed Ground will appear that Hinder players and cause slain Monsters to resurrect as Phantasms

arguments.name: Restless Ground III
arguments.description:
Many patches of Unhallowed Ground will appear that Hinder players and cause slain Monsters to resurrect as Ruin-inflicting Phantasms
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Restless Ground IV
arguments.description:
Many patches of Unhallowed Ground will appear that Hinder players and cause slain Monsters to resurrect as Ruin-inflicting Phantasms
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Stalking Ruin
arguments.description:
An invulnerable shade stalks you, inflicting Ruin with its Melee Attacks
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Ruin II
arguments.description:
A Monster type will apply double Ruin with its special ability
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Stalking Ruin III
arguments.description:
An invulnerable shade stalks you, gaining further speed and inflicting Ruin with Melee Attacks and powerful Spells
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Stalking Ruin IV
arguments.description:
An invulnerable shade stalks you, aggressively casting Spells that inflict Ruin while teleporting to random locations
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Razor Dance
arguments.description: Blades will periodically appear and fly at you, applying Corrupted Blood on Hit

arguments.name: Razor Dance II
arguments.description: Many blades will periodically appear and fly at you, applying Corrupted Blood on Hit

arguments.name: Razor Dance III
arguments.description: Swarms of blades will periodically appear and fly at you, applying Corrupted Blood on Hit

arguments.name: Razor Dance IV
arguments.description: Swarms of blades will periodically appear and fly at you, applying Corrupted Blood on Hit and leaving a trail of Blood ground

arguments.name: Totem of Costly Might
arguments.description: An invulnerable Totem will appear that imbues both its allies and its enemies with Speed and powerful Physical Damage benefits, but causes enemies to take 10% of their maximum Life and Energy Shield as Physical Damage per second

arguments.name: Totem of Costly Potency
arguments.description: An invulnerable Totem will appear that imbues both its allies and its enemies with Speed and powerful Elemental Damage benefits, but causes enemies to take 15% of their maximum Life and Energy Shield as Fire Damage per second

arguments.name: Blood Altar
arguments.description: A ring of Blood surrounds the Altar, dealing heavy Physical Damage over time

arguments.name: Blood Altar II
arguments.description: A large ring of Blood surrounds the Altar, dealing heavy Physical Damage over time

arguments.name: Limited Arena
arguments.description: The encounter area will be much smaller

arguments.name: Ruin
arguments.description:
A Monster type will apply Ruin with its special ability
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Ruin III
arguments.description:
Two Monster types will apply double Ruin with their special abilities
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Ruin IV
arguments.description:
Two Monster types will apply quadruple Ruin with their special abilities
Fail on reaching 7 Ruin

arguments.name: Reduced Recovery
arguments.description: 60% Reduced Life, Mana, and Energy Shield Recovery Rate

arguments.name: Reduced Recovery II
arguments.description: 90% Reduced Life, Mana, and Energy Shield Recovery Rate

arguments.name: Lessened Reach
arguments.description: Players have 60% less Area of Effect and Projectile Speed

arguments.name: Buffs Expire Faster
arguments.description: Buffs expire five times faster on Players

arguments.name: Less Cooldown Recovery
arguments.description: Cooldowns take five times longer to recharge

arguments.name: Escalating Damage Taken
arguments.description: For the remainder of the encounter, damage taken will slowly increase by 2% per second, up to 50%

arguments.name: Escalating Monster Speed
arguments.description: Monsters gain 5% increased attack, cast, and movement speed per second they are alive, up to 50%

arguments.name: Profane Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters deal 80% of Physical Damage Added as Chaos Damage

arguments.name: Unlucky Criticals
arguments.description:
Your Critical Strike Chance is Unlucky
Monsters take 50% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

arguments.name: Ailment and Curse Reflection
arguments.description:
Curses and Non-damaging Ailments you apply are Reflected
Monsters are unaffected by Curses

arguments.name: Drought
arguments.description: Cannot gain Flask Charges

arguments.name: Lightning Damage from Mana Costs
arguments.description: Take 1000% of Mana costs as Lightning Damage

arguments.name: Random Projectiles
arguments.description:
Your Projectiles fly in random directions
Monsters fire additional Projectiles

arguments.name: Treacherous Auras
arguments.description: Your Auras that affect Allies also affect Enemies

arguments.name: Occasional Impotence
arguments.description: You and your Minions deal no damage for 2 seconds every 8 seconds

arguments.name: Siphoned Charges
arguments.description:
Lose a Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charge every second
Monsters gain Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on hit

arguments.name: Unstoppable Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters cannot be Slowed or Stunned

arguments.name: Lethal Rare Monsters
arguments.description: Rare Monsters have 2 additional Modifiers

arguments.name: Shielding Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters have 50% chance to Block Attack and Spell Damage

arguments.name: Precise Monsters
arguments.description: Monster Hits cannot be Evaded

arguments.name: Overwhelming Monsters
arguments.description: Monster Hits Overwhelm all Physical Damage Reduction

arguments.name: Deadly Monsters
arguments.description: Monster Hits are always Critical Strikes

arguments.name: Prismatic Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters gain 50% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element

arguments.name: Resistant Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters have +50% to all Resistances

arguments.name: Dexterous Monsters
arguments.description: Monsters Suppress Spell Damage and gain 500% increased Evasion Rating

arguments.name: Siphoning Monsters
arguments.description: Monster Hits remove 10% of current Energy Shield and Mana
